mapper.sql: t.item_id as itemId, t.item_name as itemName, t.item_profile as itemProfile, t.type_id as typeId, t.class_id as classId, t.target_amount as targetAmount, t.appoint_amount as appointAmount, t.completed_amount as completedAmount, t.preheating_days as preheatingDays, t.preheating_start_time as preheatingStartTime, t.preheating_end_time as preheatingEndTime, t.crowd_days as crowdDays, t.crowd_start_time as crowdStartTime, t.crowd_end_time as crowdEndTime, t.partner_id as partnerId, t.area_id as areaId, t.header_image as headerImage, t.item_status as itemStatus, t.flag as flag, t.item_sort as itemSort, t.create_time as createTime, t.update_time as updateTime, t.operate_account as operateAccount, t.sponsor_name as sponsorName, t.lead_investor_name as leadInvestorName, t.lead_investor_amount as leadInvestorAmount, t.lead_investor_header as leadInvestorHeader
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO (item_id, item_name, item_profile, type_id, class_id, target_amount, completed_amount, preheating_days, preheating_start_time, preheating_end_time, crowd_days, crowd_start_time, crowd_end_time, partner_id, area_id, header_image, item_status, flag, item_sort, create_time, update_time, operate_account, sponsor_name, lead_investor_name, lead_investor_amount, lead_investor_header) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{itemName}, #{itemProfile}, #{typeId}, #{classId}, #{targetAmount}, #{completedAmount}, #{preheatingDays}, #{preheatingStartTime}, #{preheatingEndTime}, #{crowdDays}, #{crowdStartTime}, #{crowdEndTime}, #{partnerId}, #{areaId}, #{headerImage}, #{itemStatus}, #{flag}, #{itemSort}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{operateAccount}, #{sponsorName}, #{leadInvestorName}, #{leadInvestorAmount}, #{leadInvestorHeader})
mapper.update:
UPDATE
item_name=#{itemName},
item_profile=#{itemProfile},
type_id=#{typeId},
class_id=#{classId},
target_amount=#{targetAmount},
completed_amount=#{completedAmount},
preheating_days=#{preheatingDays},
preheating_start_time=#{preheatingStartTime},
preheating_end_time=#{preheatingEndTime},
crowd_days=#{crowdDays},
crowd_start_time=#{crowdStartTime},
crowd_end_time=#{crowdEndTime},
partner_id=#{partnerId},
area_id=#{areaId},
header_image=#{headerImage},
item_status=#{itemStatus},
flag=#{flag},
item_sort=#{itemSort},
create_time=#{createTime},
update_time=#{updateTime},
operate_account=#{operateAccount},
sponsor_name=#{sponsorName},
lead_investor_name=#{leadInvestorName},
lead_investor_amount=#{leadInvestorAmount},
lead_investor_header=#{leadInvestorHeader},
item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.select: select , CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,NOW(),t.crowd_end_time)<0 THEN 0 ELSE TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,NOW(),t.crowd_end_time) END as leavelDay, t.completed_amount/t.target_amount as completedPercent, t.appoint_amount/t.target_amount as appointPercent, t1.type_name as typeName, t2.class_name as className, t3.partner_name as partnerName FROM t LEFT JOIN `type` t1 ON t1.`type_id`=t.`type_id` LEFT JOIN `item_class` t2 ON t2.class_id=t.class_id LEFT JOIN `partner` t3 ON t3.partner_id=t.partner_id where item_id=#{id}

select , CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,NOW(),t.crowd_end_time)<0 THEN 0 ELSE TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,NOW(),t.crowd_end_time) END as leavelDay, t.completed_amount/t.target_amount as completedPercent, t.appoint_amount/t.target_amount as appointPercent, t1.type_name as typeName, t2.class_name as className FROM t LEFT JOIN `type` t1 ON t1.`type_id`=t.`type_id` LEFT JOIN `item_class` t2 ON t2.class_id=t.class_id where 1=1
and t.item_id in (${itemId})
and t.item_name like '%${itemName}%'
and t.item_status in (${itemStatus})
and t.flag=#{flag}
order by
${sortBy} ${order},
t.create_time desc
